attributes.action: Islamophobia is not freedom of speech
attributes.additional_details: As a Muslims we respect all religions and we don’t disrespect any religion or Prophet. So we want that no one disrespect our Prophet Muhammad SAW, As we love our Prophet SAW, and when someone disrespect him it hurt us and give us pain.
attributes.background:
It causes Muslims pain when our Prophet PBUH is ridiculed.
So my request to pass law on to prevent this happening in UK.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's already illegal to discriminate on the grounds of religion, or to incite hatred. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as increasing penalties for breaking these laws.
